name: Choong-Jang
meaning: Choong-Jang is the pseudonym given to General Kim Duk Ryang who lived during the Yi Dynasty, 14th Century.This pattern ends with a left-hand attack to symbolise the tragedy of his death at 27 in prison before he was able to reach full maturity.

moves.title: Closed Ready Stance A
moves.description: Keep your feet together. Maintain good posture with shoulders back and eyes forward.

moves.title: Block
moves.description: Move the right foot to a sitting stance while executing a right side front block, at the same time executing left downward block.

moves.title: Side block
moves.description: Maintain a sitting stance. Execute a left side front block, at the same time executing right downward block.

moves.title: Slow punch
moves.description: Bring right foot to left foot. Slowly execute an angle punch across your chest with your left fist.

moves.title: Double finger thrust
moves.description: Step forward with the left foot to a walking stance while executing a reverse high section thrust with a double finger.

moves.title: Double finger thrust
moves.description: Step forward with the right foot to a walking stance while executing a reverse high section thrust with a double finger.

moves.title: Backfist
moves.description: Maintain your foot position while executing a right fist front strike.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Step forward with the left foot to a walking stance while executing a outer forearm rising block

moves.title: Step R, Punch
moves.description: Step Forward (to 12:00) with Right foot. Middle Punch (Right fist).

moves.title: Slide Back
moves.description: Slide/Step Backwards (towards 6:00). Land in an L-Stance, but keep facing the Front (12:00). Guarding Block.

moves.title: Kick
moves.description: Low Front Snap Kick (Right foot) to Front (12:00).

moves.title: Spear Hand
moves.description: Land forward in a Low Stance. Spear Finger Thrust to Front (12:00).

moves.title: Ground Kick
moves.description: Drop to your Left Knee. Place both hands on the floor. Execute a High Turning Kick with your Right foot towards the Front (12:00).

moves.title: Ground Punch
moves.description: Land the kicking foot forward. Keep Left hand on the floor. Punch high with Right Fist to Front (12:00).

moves.title: Turn & Elbow
moves.description: Stand up and turn Right (180°) to face the Back (6:00). Strike with your Left Elbow backwards (towards the Front/12:00). Looking over shoulder.

moves.title: Turn & Guard
moves.description: Pivot on your feet, turning Right to face Front (12:00) again. L-Stance. Guarding Block.

moves.title: Step Back
moves.description: Step Backwards (towards 6:00). L-Stance facing Front. Scooping Block (Left palm).

moves.title: Step Back
moves.description: Step Backwards (towards 6:00). L-Stance facing Front. Knife-hand Strike (Right hand).

moves.title: Turn X-Block
moves.description: Turn Left (180°) to face the Back (6:00). Step Left. X-Fist Pressing Block.

moves.title: Knee Kick
moves.description: Grab head and smash Right Knee towards Back (6:00).

moves.title: Turn & Guard
moves.description: Land foot. Turn Left (180°) to face Front (12:00). Guarding Block.

moves.title: Slide & Elbow
moves.description: Slide your Right foot forward. Turn your body to face the Back (6:00). Strike with Right Elbow backwards (towards Front/12:00).

moves.title: Turn & Guard
moves.description: Pivot Left to face Front (12:00). Guarding Block.

moves.title: Side Kick
moves.description: Side Piercing Kick (Right foot) to Front (12:00).

moves.title: Land & Press
moves.description: Land the kick. Pivot to face the Back (6:00). Rear Foot Stance. Twin Palm Pressing Block.

moves.title: Step & Strike
moves.description: Step forward to Back (6:00). High Block, then Backfist Strike (Right hand).

moves.title: Turn & Spear
moves.description: Turn Left (180°) to face Front (12:00). High Spear Finger Thrust (Left hand).

moves.title: Kick
moves.description: Low Front Snap Kick (Right foot) to Front (12:00).

moves.title: Land & Turn
moves.description: Land the kick. Pivot your feet to face the Back (6:00). Slow motion stance preparation.

moves.title: Stamp & Strike
moves.description: Stamp forward to Back (6:00). Back Hand Downward Strike (Left hand).

moves.title: Palm Smash
moves.description: Stay facing Back. Smash Right Fist into Left Palm.

moves.title: Stamp & Strike
moves.description: Step and Stamp forward to Back (6:00). Back Hand Downward Strike (Right hand).

moves.title: Palm Smash
moves.description: Stay facing Back. Smash Left Fist into Right Palm.

moves.title: Turn & Stamp
moves.description: Turn Left (180°) to face Front (12:00). Stamp. Knife Hand Strike (Left).

moves.title: Slip & Backfist
moves.description: Slip (slide) forward towards Front (12:00). Backfist Strike (Right).

moves.title: Step & Stamp
moves.description: Step forward towards Front (12:00). Stamp. Knife Hand Strike (Right).

moves.title: Slip & Backfist
moves.description: Slip (slide) forward towards Front (12:00). Backfist Strike (Left).

moves.title: Turn Low Block
moves.description: Turn Left (180°) to face Back (6:00). Low Reverse Knife-hand Block.

moves.title: 9-Block
moves.description: Slip backwards (towards 12:00) but keep facing Back (6:00). 9-Shape Block.

moves.title: Step Low Block
moves.description: Step forward towards Back (6:00). Low Reverse Knife-hand Block.

moves.title: 9-Block
moves.description: Slip backwards (towards 12:00) but keep facing Back (6:00). 9-Shape Block.

moves.title: Twin Strike
moves.description: Move Right foot backwards. You are now standing at C, looking at C (Back/6:00). Twin Horizontal Knife-hand Strike.

moves.title: Arc-Hand
moves.description: Stay facing Back (6:00). High Arc-hand Strike (Right hand).

moves.title: Kick
moves.description: Front Snap Kick (Right foot) to Back (6:00).

moves.title: Land Arc-Hand
moves.description: Land forward towards Back (6:00). High Arc-hand Strike (Left hand).

moves.title: Kick
moves.description: Front Snap Kick (Left foot) to Back (6:00).

moves.title: Land Punch
moves.description: Land forward towards Back (6:00). Middle Punch (Right fist).

moves.title: Punch
moves.description: Stay there. Middle Punch (Left fist). Fast motion.

moves.title: Twin Knuckle
moves.description: Bring Right foot to Left. Feet together facing Back (6:00). Twin Fore-knuckle Fist Punch (Crescent shape to sides).

moves.title: Turn Left
moves.description: Turn Left to face the Right Wall (3:00). Step out. Low Knife-hand Block.

moves.title: Open Punch
moves.description: Stay there. High Open Fist Punch to Right Wall (3:00).

moves.title: Turn Right
moves.description: Turn Right (180°) to face the Left Wall (9:00). Step out. Low Knife-hand Block.

moves.title: Open Punch
moves.description: Stay there. High Open Fist Punch to Left Wall (9:00).
